block_usable_characters.description: Basic block names shall only use single-byte alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) and single-byte underscore (_). Line breaks and single-byte spaces are not permitted when adding new block names (except allowed for Inport and Outport blocks initially). Double-byte characters and control characters are prohibited.

block_no_numbers_at_start.description: Basic block names shall not begin with a number (except Inport and Outport blocks).

block_no_underscore_at_start.description: Basic block names shall not begin with an underscore (except Inport and Outport blocks).

block_no_underscore_at_end.description: Basic block names shall not end with an underscore (except Inport and Outport blocks).

block_no_consecutive_underscores.description: Basic block names shall not contain consecutive underscores (except Inport and Outport blocks).

block_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Basic block names shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword (except Inport and Outport blocks).

block_max_name_length.description: Basic block name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
